description: T1 - Lime (closest to No.33 gates) - Reduce back to most recent previous reduction points i.e. by 1-2m and remove all epicormic up to crown break and basal epicormic - Final height 16m/spread 7mT2 - Elm - Fell to ground levelT3 - Silver Birch - Fell to ground levelT4 - Lime - Reduce back to most recent previous reduction points i.e. by 1-2m and remove all epicormic up to crown break and basal epicormic - Final height 16m/spread 7mT5 - Lime - Reduce back to most recent previous reduction points i.e. by 1-2m and remove all epicormic up to crown break and basal epicormic - Final height 16m/spread 7mT6 - Acer Negundo - Reduce back to previous i.e. by 1-1.5 and remove epicormic up to crown break - Final height 12m/spread 6mT7 - Acer Negundo - Reduce back to previous i.e. by 1-1.5m and remove epicormic up to crown break - Final height 12m/spread 6mT8 - Cherry - Crown reduce by approx. 2m and remove epicormic up to crown break - Final height 10m/spread 5mT9 - Acer Negundo - Crown reduce by approx. 2m and remove epicormic up to crown break - Final height 10m/spread 5mT10 - Whitebeam - Crown reduce by approx. 2m and remove epicormic up to crown break - Final height 10m/spread 5mT11 - Liquidamber - Crown reduce by approx. 2m and remove epicormic up to crown break - Final height 10m/spread 5m
